h2.strong: Family First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA Act)

span.h3: The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19.These provisions will apply from April 1, 2020 through December 31, 2020.
span.p: Do you qualify? Want more information?FFCRA Information

p.strong: If you need to utilize this expanded leave please fill out the

a.aria-label: COVID-19 Leave Request Affidavit file group.
Downnload COVID -19 Attendance Affidavit HR 2020.pdf file.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Leave Request Affidavit
